title: Front-End Developer
description: A budding front-end developer with two years of hands-on practice in web development. Skilled in creating responsive and engaging web interfaces, I'm committed to refining my expertise and embracing new challenges.

title: Artist
description: An artist at heart with a lifetime of creative exploration. My artistic vision inspires unique solutions, though I'm eager to collaborate on more professional projects to channel these ideas effectively.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: A beginner UI/UX designer with a keen eye for aesthetics and functionality. My artistic background and dedication to user-centered design drive me to craft intuitive and visually appealing digital experiences.
